name: Project Infinity (Mitch)
description:
How far can you get in this highly stylised fast paced platformer. 

Inspired by the likes of Geometry Dash and Gravity Guy this cube just wants to make it as far as possible without hitting a spike and exploding into 100 little pieces. 

Press the space bar to flip the gravity, allowing Mr. Cube to make it through even the most impossible stages.

Compare your high score with your friends and see who can get the furthest.
